Premium dedicated server packages from XeHost - with control panel!

Welcome
XeHost.net is a friendly, reliable, and secure environment to place your web hosting account! We closely monitor and maintain our servers, ensuring optimum performance for all our valued customers, and their visitors. We never oversell our resources, so you will have complete peace of mind with us.

We offer honest, fast, friendly, and helpful support, and are keen to help both new and experienced clients alike. We have a 15-minute response time guarantee!

Standard Features
» Complete Control Panel Access
» Free R1Soft Backup Agent
» Unlimited Free SSL Certificates
» 15 IP Addresses
» 100 Mbps Private Network Access
» Complete Customization
» 24x7 Support
» Free Setup
